title: Sound On: Sen. Blackburn, Delta Variant, Infrastructure
itunes:title: Sound On: Sen. Blackburn, Delta Variant, Infrastructure
description:
Guests: Bloomberg White House reporter Jordan Fabian, Republican Tennessee Senator Marsha Blackburn, Bloomberg reporter Ed Ludlow, Andrew Rossow, Attorney and CEO of AR Media Consulting, and Bloomberg Politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
